descriptionHtml:
This Lorecraft content addon adds two books that cover the tents and backpacks from Chesko\'s Frostfall.

Added Items:
Misc - Cold Weather Tents: Lorecraft book for all of Chesko\'s tents, including the expansion tents
Misc - Cold Weather Backpacks: Lorecraft book for all of Chesko\'s backpacks

Install Instructions: Just put the esp in your data directory and activate it with your favorite mod manager, make sure it comes after Frostfall in your load order
author: barcharcraz
